name: SNKRX
description:
SNKRX is an arcade shooter roguelite where you control a snake made of characters, with each one having their own attacks, passives and classes. Inspired by the auto-battler genre, each character in the snake has a set of classes, and combining enough units of the same class together grants additional class bonuses. Characters can also be upgraded to be more powerful when copies are bought from the shop.

Gameplay

  • Your snake can't stop moving, turn it left or right to steer
  • Your characters shoot automatically when close to enemies
  • Combine characters of the same classes together to unlock unique class bonuses
  • Clearing arenas grants gold, which can be used to buy characters at the shop
  • Buying enough copies of characters levels them up, making them more powerful

Features

  • 40+ characters, each with unique attacks and passives
  • 10+ classes, each giving stat boosts and modifiers to your snake
  • 25+ levels of increasing difficulty as the run progresses
  • 15+ Steam achievements
  • Soundtrack by Kubbi
